Package design.aeonic.nifty.api.transfer.fluid

Class FluidStack

java.lang.Object
design.aeonic.nifty.api.transfer.fluid.FluidStack
public class FluidStack extends Object
Represents fluids in a tank or somethin. Up to you man.

Similar to Forge's fluid stack, but somewhat simplified and with a few key differences, namely the removal of some optionals for less checks.
